entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 09:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
